Articles.Content:
Like everyone else, colonies.

If you're going to exile yourself to a swamp planet you'll want comfortable living arrangements.
I'm most excited for the new parts and paint jobs. But also, just to try out all of the features and graphics!
Looking forward to modding

I'm excited for a lot of things. I'm excited for new challenges, and new opportunities to take on old challenges. I'm excited for new sights and new perspectives. But in more concrete terms, I am excited for a new, better documented modding API; continuous collision detection; native, minimally jank multiplayer; colony-building; the new VAB. Interstellar stuff is nice enough too, and I'm curious about how science will look when it's designed in almost from the start.
Excited about interstellar travel and all the new stuff we get to plan and explore!

Interstellar, i would love to see if there is a "deep space" where you are nowhere and in a random area or if just you point towards that sun and it is like a divided area between them where you can go between them in seconds. and especialy the science i would love to see that!
Most excited about procedural wings and interstellar travel!
Looking forward to exploring the solar system and seeing what new features there are!
I'm excited for new modding opportunities
I'm excited to play in the new and improved VAB.  It seems to be where I spend most of my time in KSP; being able to construct several vessels simultaneously is a dream!
The interstellar ship from Avatar! but without the bad stuff that people do in that movie.
Excited for the new game mechanics, and new solar systems.

Very excited for the interstellar travel (when it gets added, that is!)

 

-K

Pretty basic but I'm most excited about the eye candy. Flashy modern UI and improved planet/ship visuals with custom colors! Can't wait to see where the modding community can take things down the line.
I'm excited for the new colony career mode.
good luck! i hope i can play with my 1050ti lol

Me seeing this

hol up

Im excited for the new rocket engines! Like Metallic hydrogen and Orion drives!
I'm very excited for the new Kerbol system. The teasers show at the very least The Mun and Duna looking awesome, and I love the Iapetus-esq equatorial ridged around a ringed Dres.
Excited for multiplayer so my friends can carry me and then nuke me off the face of the Kerbolar system
I’m hyped for being able to blow u- I mean fly my rockets in ultra-high detail!
I'm excited for colonies and multiplayer
I'm excited to be a small part in the forming of the sequel to my all-time favorite game - which I was also fortunate to have a small part in the forming of.
I'm excited for interstellar travel and being able to visit new worlds with their own stories.
I am sooo ready for Spaceplanes now.    ERREYTHING GETTING WINGS
I’m excited to give my craft unique paint schemes and to play around with the new crew and station parts!
